chunk:
Gaondodam Pure All-in-one Moisturizer

Brand: GAONDODAM

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: WATER, PROPANEDIOL, CAPRYLIC/CAPRIC TRIGLYCERIDE, CETEARYL ALCOHOL, BUTYROSPERMUM PARKII (SHEA) BUTTER, GLYCERYL STEARATE CITRATE, METHYL TRIMETHICONE, vegetable GLYCOPROTEINS, BETA-GLUCAN, GLYCERIN, BUTYLENE GLYCOL, HYDROXYETHYL ACRYLATE/S

ROXYETHYL ACRYLATE/SODIUM ACRYLOYLDIMETHYL TAURATE COPOLYMER, POLYGLYCERYL-10 STEARATE, GLYCERYL CAPRYLATE, ETHYLHEXYLGLYCERIN, TROMETHAMINE, DISODIUM EDTA

Directions: In the next step of serums, take suitable amount and smooth over the moisturizer on your face and neck.

Warnings: 1. In case of having symptoms, when the product is in use or after

t is in use or after use, such as red rash, swollenness, itching by direct sunlight, you need to consult a dermatologist. 2. Avoid using this product on the part where you have a scar. 3. Caution for treatment and keeping a) Keep this product out of children’s reach. b) Avoid exposing this to direct sunlight.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restric
s: HIGH: Use Restrictions; MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
